WorkItem.Description:
My web page uses themes.   So if I use either chirp.css   I end up with both the uncompressed and the compress files included in my page.

If I change the input filename to chirp.css.x   and my options I then loose my text editing ability.

Comments.Message: For .less files it would be nice to be able to rename the .less full files to .css.full so it does not participate as well.
